#summary Description of the eSaran API

= The eSaran API =

The eSaran API is designed so that programmers can build their own wrappers for programs for submitting to remote HPC resources. There are a few ways to use the API, each of which can be used exclusively or mixed to get the desired results:

  # [eSaranCallbackWrappers Callback method];
  # [eSaranXMLwrappers XML method];
  # [eSaranUtilityFunctions Direct call method].
